                                Regents Meeting   June 23, 2021
                                 
 
 
 
 
 
 Regent Cecilia V. Estolano appointed as new Chair and Regent Rich Leib as Vice Chair of the UC Board of Regents, effective July 1, 2021  
 At its May meeting, the Board elected new Board leadership and approved appointments to standing committees for the 2021-22 academic year. All changes approved are effective July 1, 2021.
